[Condition Class] uri-parse-error

Package

ystok.uri

Superclasses

uri-error, parse-error

Description

The class of conditions signaled when the input URI string is badly formed or contains an illegal percent encoding sequence.

See also
  • parse-uri [Function]
  • percent-decode [Function]
